resources.string: Collect the sputum for 15 minutes during a hypertonic saline treatment session. Perform the pH measurment within 15 minutes after the specimen collection
Remove the probe from the storage container, rinse on all sides with running tap water for 30 seconds and blot dry with lint-free tissue.
Assemble the probe, electronic module and smartphone with the provided connectors. First connect the electronic module to the smartphone and then connect the pH probe to the electronic module.
Insert the probe\'s tip into the sample and press the Begin Test button.
Disconnect the probe and clean on all sides with running tap water for 60 seconds, blot dry with lint-free tissue and store in the provided storage container.
Discard the closed sputum collection cup in the trash.
